name: Power to the Brand
headline: AI Co-Pilot for Customer Support Teams
description: We help Customer Experience & Support leaders get Voice of Customer (VoC) insights by analyzing 100% support tickets, fine-tuned on customized requirements. Dig deep into existing user feedback for Quality Assurance & improvements in product & service, within minutes not weeks.

founders.name: Daniel Chua, Founder
founders.description: Ex-lawyer turned entrepreneur (because 5 hours of sleep was still too much). Excited about tech, especially in how it can impact the physical world. Avid backpacker, can't wait to travel across South America some day.

founders.name: Rasmus Chow, Founder
founders.description: On a mission to help companies elevate their Customer Experience using AI

## Quality Assurance AI Software for 
Customer Support Teams
## Backed By:
[![Y Combinator Logo \(1\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_0aaaf775a83d43948d92b89751f3a1fb~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_164,h_50,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Y%20Combinator%20Logo%20\(1\).png)](https://powertothebrand.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/power-to-the-brand>)
[Book a Call](https://powertothebrand.com/<https:/calendly.com/rasmuschow/30-minute-call>)
[![GIF for Website.gif](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_7f08c669af8f42eda5c5306cb6a4f3bc~mv2.gif)](https://powertothebrand.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ciR5ZOeHoY>)
Trusted By:
[![1.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_3ad70cff0fe44cc2bcf18d64f8d24b1a~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_219,h_120,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/1.png)](https://powertothebrand.com/<http:/www.xendit.co>)
[![2.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_53eb91a82ea64565aa771c2236dd7af9~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_264,h_150,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/2.png)](https://powertothebrand.com/<http:/www.tiket.com>)
[![3.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_5b3ec42bfda444bbbb5d4aeda1f4917e~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_247,h_144,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/3.png)](https://powertothebrand.com/<http:/www.taptalk.io>)
## The Value
What you can expect from using our AI software
![diagram.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_d374b094f7984fd4be6977e033fb4d84~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_116,h_116,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/diagram.png)
### Increase Internal Quality
Monitor conversations to ensure that agents meet your internal standards - including on things like technical product knowledge.
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_b365e07de0414540aa5a1e5d5dc0d0d9~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_136,h_136,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/952f40_b365e07de0414540aa5a1e5d5dc0d0d9~mv2.png)
### Reduce Cost
Streamline your teams by having our AI replace the grading workflow of your QA process.
#### Trained on highly-customized internal standards
  1. Customer conversations are graded by our AI according to your company standards.
  2. We work with highly customized scorecards taking into account your company’s nuances.


![Screenshot 2025-01-20 at 11.06.00 PM.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_6a1c4ec7e3ff47dfab908ce250cdd05f~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_123,h_121,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Screenshot%202025-01-20%20at%2011_06_00%E2%80%AFPM.png)
![Sample Knowledge Base.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_fff17286ef104feaaf468648071e7126~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_34,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Sample%20Knowledge%20Base.png)
#### References Your Knowledge Base
  1. So you know whether your agents are following procedure or giving the correct response.
  2. Retrieves source documents to give you confidence of the AI’s analysis.


#### Highly Accurate Retrievals & Analysis
  1. Our AI retrieves your internal documentation with a high level of accuracy. 
  2. Our AI's analysis closely matches that of the human QA evaluators & even outperforms the human.


![GIF for Website \(2\).gif](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_d8414c1b378e4c0ab18dd35d4db1b8ba~mv2.gif/v1/fill/w_108,h_61,al_c,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,pstr/GIF%20for%20Website%20\(2\)_gif.gif)
# Why Us?
We understand that accuracy & consistency matters so much more in QA - and we're don't take security lightly
Highly Accurate
Consistent Output
Handles Complexity Well
Security Trust Center
## Curious to find out more?
Let's have a chat & we'd be happy to show you more.
[Book a Demo](https://powertothebrand.com/<https:/calendly.com/rasmuschow/30-minute-call>)
## Demo Video
## AI-Automated Compliance Checks
For Sales or Customer Support QA
## Backed By:
![Y Combinator Logo \(1\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/952f40_0aaaf775a83d43948d92b89751f3a1fb~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_163,h_46,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Y%20Combinator%20Logo%20\(1\).png)
[Book 15-Min Discovery Chat](https://powertothebrand.com/<https:/calendly.com/danielchuaym/30-min>)
![Disintegrating Sphere](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_d8c8c150557a41fb986c6162f2556939~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_98,h_60,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Abstract.jpg)
![Abstract Sphere](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_19e4015646354ea68be26277c78e12ad~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_98,h_55,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Portrait.jpg)
### Get up to 95% accuracy & alignment versus human evaluators – on your own QA metrics
01
## Self-Improving Custom AI – Built Just For You
We "translate" your compliance checks or QA questions into highly reliable and consistent AI evaluation workflows.
​
Under the hood, we implement fine-tuning, prompt engineering, agentic processing and other advanced AI/ML techniques to achieve your goals.
02
## Superhuman Consistency & Scale
Our AI infrastructure is built to evaluate millions of tickets very quickly AND consistently. 
​
We start from foundational ML theory, and help you run golden dataset evaluations and regressions testing before going live.
03
## Fully Handled Deployment, Onboarding & Transition
The best part? We fully hand-hold you from day 1. 
​
Our product is designed for completely non-technical teams. You're not expected to know anything AI. Onboarding with us is like working with an AI consultant.
## Deploying World-Class LLMs
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/a3c153_359ef1bb117e4700966b2cadac5fd7f2~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_150,h_150,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Logo%201.png)

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/a3c153_9afc95946222402aaf277af5b6cea7b4~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_150,h_150,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Logo%203.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/a3c153_621752c9c4d249f9a26875c1d0f7319e~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_150,h_150,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Logo%204.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/a3c153_a9cafa2aefdf4701afe2b42fc584aa8c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_150,h_150,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Logo%205.png)

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Power to the Brand**

Founded in 2021 and based in San Francisco, Power to the Brand is a dynamic startup that emerged from Y Combinator's Batch W22. Its mission? To act as an AI co-pilot for customer support teams, fundamentally transforming the way businesses analyze customer interactions.

The company originated with a clear focus: to help customer experience and support leaders extract valuable Voice of Customer (VoC) insights. By analyzing 100% of support tickets in a matter of minutes—rather than weeks—the team provides unparalleled clarity on user feedback. This enables organizations to enhance both their products and services rapidly.

**Core Offerings:**
Power to the Brand specializes in quality assurance (QA) software specifically for customer support teams. Their AI-driven solutions deliver several key benefits:
- **Increased Internal Quality**: The software monitors conversations to ensure agents meet designated internal standards.
- **Cost Reduction**: By streamlining QA workflows, the AI reduces the time and personnel needed to maintain quality checks.
- **Highly Customized Training**: The AI grades customer interactions based on tailored scorecards that reflect a company’s unique requirements.

**The Value Proposition:**
The system not only matches human evaluators in performance but often surpasses them with its consistent, rapid, and accurate assessments. Emphasizing security and reliability, Power to the Brand prides itself on providing a fortress of trust around data management.

With a small but dedicated team of four, the company is already trusted by well-known clients and believes in the transformative power of AI in customer support. They offer a variety of engagement options for prospective clients, including demos and discovery calls.

In essence, Power to the Brand is not just about improving customer support; it's about redefining it through AI. Their approach is straightforward: they make complex AI technology accessible for non-technical teams, driving efficiency and efficacy in customer interactions.

For those interested, you can explore more about their offerings and schedule time to chat on their [website](https://powertothebrand.com/). 

### Why Power to the Brand?
- **Accuracy & Consistency**: Achieve up to 95% alignment with human evaluators on QA metrics.
- **Comprehensive Support**: From deployment to onboarding, they ensure clients receive hands-on assistance throughout the transition.
- **Self-Improving AI**: The solution evolves with your needs, continually improving over time.

Power to the Brand is bringing a refreshing perspective to customer support—it's a place where cutting-edge AI meets practical implementation, creating a smarter future for businesses.
